member.name: T:NativeXml.Contracts.V1.EntityContractV1
member.summary: The V1 contract for an "entity".

member.name: P:NativeXml.Contracts.V1.EntityContractV1.Blob
member.summary: Gets or sets an arbitrary BLOB for the client to associate data with the entity.

member.name: P:NativeXml.Contracts.V1.EntityContractV1.Count
member.summary: Gets or sets the count associated with this entity.

member.name: P:NativeXml.Contracts.V1.EntityContractV1.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier for the entity.

member.name: P:NativeXml.Contracts.V1.EntityContractV1.Legacy
member.summary: Gets or sets the legacy status.

member.name: P:NativeXml.Contracts.V1.EntityContractV1.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the entity.

member.name: P:NativeXml.Contracts.V1.EntityContractV1.DiffTest
member.summary: Gets or sets the DiffTest.

member.name: T:NativeXml.Contracts.V1.PagedEntityContractV1
member.summary: The V1 contract for a paged set of entities.

member.name: P:NativeXml.Contracts.V1.PagedEntityContractV1.Items
member.summary: Gets the items in this page of the entities.

member.name: P:NativeXml.Contracts.V1.PagedEntityContractV1.PagingInfo
member.summary: Gets or sets information related to paging.

member.name: T:NativeXml.Contracts.V1.PagingInfoContractV1
member.summary: Represents the requisite information to page calls.

member.name: P:NativeXml.Contracts.V1.PagingInfoContractV1.ContinuationToken
member.summary: Gets or sets the continuationToken of this collection.

member.name: P:NativeXml.Contracts.V1.PagingInfoContractV1.TotalItems
member.summary: Gets or sets the total count of the items in this collection.

member.name: T:NativeXml.EntityV1Controller
member.summary: Defines V1 operations for the entities resource.

member.summary: Adds a new entity and assigns it a unique identifier.
member.param: Specifies the verions of the contracts used

member.summary: Retrieves a specific entity instance.

Should the API return legacy versions.
Should the API return legacy versions.
member.returns: Task resulting in the entity contract

member.name: M:NativeXml.EntityV1Controller.GetAsync
member.summary: Gets a paged collection of entities matching the query parameters.
member.param: Specifies the verions of the contracts used
member.returns: Task resulting in the paged entity set contract

member.summary: Updates an existing entity.

member.returns: Task resulting in the updated entity contract

member.summary: The ID value present in the URI differs from the one present in the request body.

member.name: T:NativeXml.ServiceHost
member.summary: Hosts a web service.

member.name: M:NativeXml.ServiceHost.Dispose
member.summary: Stops and disposes the service.

member.name: M:NativeXml.ServiceHost.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Cleans up the resources associated with the service.

member.name: M:NativeXml.ServiceHost.OnCancelKeyPress(System.Object,System.ConsoleCancelEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the cancel key press event by shutting down the service should a cancel key press be encountered.

member.name: M:NativeXml.ServiceHost.Run
member.summary: Runs the host (starting it if not already started), and blocks until the exe receives a cancel event.

member.name: M:NativeXml.ServiceHost.Run(NativeXml.WaitHandleSignal)
member.summary: Runs the service (starting it if not already started), and blocks until a new line is input via the console.
member.param: The signal to use for the control break event.

member.name: M:NativeXml.ServiceHost.Start
member.summary: Starts the service.

member.name: M:NativeXml.Startup.Configuration(Owin.IAppBuilder)
member.summary: This code configures Web API. The Startup class is specified as a type parameter in the WebApp.Start method.

member.name: T:NativeXml.WaitHandleSignal
member.summary: A simple interception mechanism to let a 3rd party know when the worker is waiting.

member.summary: Disposes the signal.

member.name: M:NativeXml.WaitHandleSignal.Set
member.summary: Sets the signal.

member.name: M:NativeXml.WaitHandleSignal.WaitForWaitOne(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Waits for a call to WaitOne.
member.param: The amount of time to wait.
member.returns: True if a signal was received.

member.name: M:NativeXml.WaitHandleSignal.WaitOne
member.summary: Waits for a signal.
